summary: A girl, who lives with her deaf parents, discovers that she has the gift of singing.
cast: Karin Viard|François Damiens|Eric Elmosnino|Louane Emera|Roxane Duran|Ilian Bergala|Luca Gelberg|Mar Sodupe|Stéphan Wojtowicz|Jérôme Kircher|Bruno Gomila|Véronique Poulain|Philippe Dusseau|Clémence Lassalas|Melchior Lebeaut|Céline Jorrion|Manuel Weber|Sébastien Agius|Giulia Foïs|Michel Amsellem|Matt Beurois|Pascal Duthuin|Lou Ravelli|Noël Sorrente
title: La familia Bélier
